Point.summary: The Point class that represents a point in three-dimensional space.

X.value: Gets or sets the X-axis coordinate of the current point.

Y.value: Gets or sets the Y-axis coordinate of the current point.

Z.value: Gets or sets the Z-axis of the current point.

Equals.summary: Compares the current point to the specified object for equality.
Equals.returns: true if is a point and the X, Y and Z coordinates of the current point and are equal; otherwise, false.

GetHashCode.summary: Returns the hash code for the current point.
GetHashCode.returns: The hash code for the current instance.

Vector.summary: The Vector class. Contains methods for performing operations on 3-dimensional vectors.

X.value: The X component of the current vector.

Y.value: The Y component of the current vector.

Z.value: The Z component of the current vector.

AddVectorPoint.summary: Translates the specified point by the specified vector and returns the resulting point.
AddVectorPoint.param: The amount to translate the specified point.

Negate.summary: Negates the specified vector. The new vector has the same magnitude, but its direction is the opposite.

MultiplyDoubleVector.summary: Multiplies the specified vector by the specified scalar.

Subtract.param: The vector from which is subtracted.

MultiplyVectorVector.summary: Calculates the dot product of the two specified vectors.
MultiplyVectorVector.returns: Returns a double containing the scalar dot product of and .

Equals.summary: Compares the current vector to the specified object for equality.
Equals.returns: true if is a vector and the X, Y and Z components of the current vector and are equal; otherwise, false.

GetHashCode.summary: Returns the hash code for the current vector.
GetHashCode.returns: The hash code for the current instance.
